inclusion.criterion: Subject is more than 18 years of age and diagnosed with secondary hyperparathyroidism
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: has a pretreatment iPTH > 300 pg/mL, receiving chronic hemodialysis.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Treatment with Zemplar Injection is indicated clinically according to the criteria of participating investigator.
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Subject has a corrected serum calcium >10.5 mg/dL, serum phosphorus > 6.5 mg/dL or subjects with corrected Ca x P>65.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Subject has known hypersensitivity and/or toxicity to vitamin D metabolites and/or other product ingredients, or has participated in clinical study within the last month
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient is a 22yo F with systemic mastocytosis, presenting with flushing and tachycardia. She responded well to IV steroids and diphenydramine.
